lead_paragraph: Southampton have signed attacking midfielder Sofiane Boufal from Ligue 1 side Lille on a five-year contract for a club-record fee, the Premier League club said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Southampton Sign Boufal for Club-Record Fee
headline.main: Southampton Sign Boufal for Club-Record Fee

snippet: Southampton have signed attacking midfielder Sofiane Boufal from Ligue 1 side Lille on a five-year contract for a club-record fee, the Premier League club said on Monday....
